scripts.tests_chrome_headed: npx cypress run  --spec cypress/tests/myE2e/mainPage.spec.ts --browser chrome --headed true
scripts.tests_chrome_headed_noexit: npx cypress run  --spec cypress/tests/myE2e/mainPage.spec.ts --browser chrome --headed true --no-exit
scripts.tests_chrome_headed_qa: npx cypress run  --spec cypress/tests/myE2e/mainPage.spec.ts --browser chrome --headed true --env type='qa'
